record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 17, 2007)

[Page: H11696]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, unfortunately, I was unable to be present for the rollcall votes on H.R. 2095, the Federal Railroad Safety Improvement Act and the Republican motion to recommit. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on H.R. 2095 and "nay" on the motion to recommit.
